name: T2
description: '''T2''' (born '''Tafadzwa Tawonezvi''') (born May 1988) is a British [[record producer]].  His single "[[Heartbroken (T2 song)|Heartbroken]]", featuring [[Jodie Aysha]], hit No. 2 on the [[UK Singles Chart]] and was certified platinum by the [[British Phonographic Industry|BPI]] in 2022. T2 rewrote the lyrics of the tune late in 2007, in support of [[Ricky Hatton]]'s [[boxing]] match against [[Floyd Mayweather]]. In 2008, T2 teamed up with [[Addictive (English duo)|Addictive]] to release "Gonna Be Mine". He has also worked with [[Dizzee Rascal]], [[Pixie Lott]], [[Craig David]], [[Addictive (English duo)|Addictive]], Gia and [[Rebecca Ferguson (singer)|Rebecca Ferguson]].
